text: Nummah moominiiney Yalli isi kitaabal (Qhuraan kinnuk), Yallih Aayootal koroositaah teetil Anqasah taabben waqdi, toysa isin keenî luk madaffeyina iyyaanam Siinil oobise, usun Yallih Aayootal aban Anqasak Aka walalat cullu iyyaanam fanah, diggah isin tohut keenî luk daffeyteenik, toysa isin dambil ken innah yan mara kinniton, Diggah Yalli munaafiqhiin kee koroosite mara inkih jahannam giral kobxise-le
